mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.nm_t as s_nm_t,c.name as sy_name,d.name as sh_name, f.nm_t as pact_nm_t,g.nm_t as a_nm_t FROM test a LEFT JOIN sample b ON a.SAMPLE_ID=b.ID LEFT JOIN members c ON a.SY_ID=c.ID LEFT JOIN members d ON a.SH_ID=d.ID LEFT JOIN entrust e ON a.PID=e.ID LEFT JOIN pact f ON e.PID=f.ID LEFT JOIN accnt g ON f.PID=g.ID WHERE a.ID=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO test
ROW_ID, C_DT, UP_DT, C_ID, PID, BU_ID, CODE, SY_DT, DD_T, SAMPLE_ID, JL_T, SY_ID, SYQZ_ID, SH_ID, SHYJ_T, SHQZ_ID, SPQZ_ID, BG_F, SH_DT, BG_DT, E_DT, CM_TX, STATUS, FQ_FLG, EWM,
#{row_id}, #{c_dt}, #{up_dt}, #{c_id}, #{pid}, #{bu_id}, #{code}, #{sy_dt}, #{dd_t}, #{sample_id}, #{jl_t}, #{sy_id}, #{syqz_id}, #{sh_id}, #{shyj_t}, #{shqz_id}, #{spqz_id}, #{bg_f}, #{sh_dt}, #{bg_dt}, #{e_dt}, #{cm_tx}, #{status}, #{fq_flg}, #{ewm},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select * from test a left join entrust b on b.id = a.pid left join sample c on c.id = a.SAMPLE_ID where a.code is not null and unix_timestamp(b.WT_DT) >=unix_timestamp(#{wt_dtFrom}) and unix_timestamp(b.WT_DT) <=unix_timestamp(#{wt_dtTo}) and b.FLG = #{flg} and c.prod_id = #{prod_id} and a.bu_id = #{bu_id} order by a.code desc LIMIT #{fromPage},#{toPage}

select a.code, b.wt_dt from test a left join entrust b on a.pid = b.id left join sample c on c.id = a.sample_id where a.code is not null and unix_timestamp(b.WT_DT) >=unix_timestamp(#{wt_dtFrom}) and unix_timestamp(b.WT_DT) <=unix_timestamp(#{wt_dtTo}) and b.FLG = #{flg} and c.prod_id = #{prod_id} and a.bu_id = #{bu_id} order by b.wt_dt desc,a.code desc LIMIT #{fromPage},#{toPage}
